name: A Ghost Story (Revelio studio)
description:
Revelio studio presents 

A ghost Story 

A game by Alhussein Ali

The game following a cute ghost doing his daily jobs in Ghosts town where ghosts are live in pace together far away from the humans and their problems.

Made with Unreal Engine 5     

Inputs: 

WASD - move

TAP - show menu 

E- Interact 

ESC- Pause
